query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS userSkills (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  skillName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  proficiencyLevel ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'expert') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'intermediate',
  yearsOfExperience DECIMAL(4, 1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  description TEXT,
  endorsements INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isEndorsed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_skill (userId, skillName),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_proficiencyLevel (proficiencyLevel)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  skillName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  proficiencyLevel ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'expert') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'intermediate',
  yearsOfExperience DECIMAL(4, 1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  description TEXT,
  endorsements INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  isEndorsed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_skill (userId, skillName),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_proficiencyLevel (proficiencyLevel)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
